post.title: other rooms...
post.content: last updated: 9/23/11 on 8/29/10 @ jvc rs20 937 hours - bumped up lamp to "high" mode and turned apeture from 0 to -3. * link to ht thread pics overview of basement and ht (10/17/09) * index (indexing idea from oman321's thread) (...a work in progress...) (av123 forum thread - 1080p projector and screen questions #8211; how to choose? - link - starting from 2-20-08) - "my ht system(s)" - "the expert#8217;s mind thinks it knows everything and therefore sets up extra standards that are not really necessary.#8221;
